solution_line_template: If Spaatz has {less_than_half_amount} less than half the number of gemstones as does Frankie, then half as many as Frankie is {spaatz_gemstones}+{less_than_half_amount}={half_frankie_gemstones} gemstones

If {half_frankie_gemstones} is half the number of gemstones on Frankie's collar, then Frankie has {half_frankie_gemstones}*{multiplier_for_full}=<<{half_frankie_gemstones}*{multiplier_for_full}={frankie_gemstones}>>{frankie_gemstones} gemstones.

If Binkie has {binkie_multiplier} times as many gemstones as Frankie, then Binkie has {binkie_multiplier}*{frankie_gemstones}=<<{binkie_multiplier}*{frankie_gemstones}={binkie_gemstones}>>{binkie_gemstones}
